alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 9:44PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Ohio. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times through late tonight. Snow will diminish from west to east on Tuesday morning. The higher snow amounts are expected inland from Lake Erie with much less near the lakeshore. Temperatures will fall into the 20s overnight with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Lakeshore; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull
